Package ColorBoard

Class ColoredNode

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.shape.Shape
javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
ColorBoard.ColoredNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ColoredNode
extends javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle
This represents the single block of the board.
Author:
ilkan Mert Okul

    • isEqualColor

      public boolean isEqualColor​(ColoredNode other)
      Returns true if given color is equal to this object's blockColor property
      Parameters:
      other - Other node's color.
      Returns:
      equality of colors.

    • toggleChosen

      public void toggleChosen()
      This is only a visual upgrade to make user sure what he/she has chosen. It makes this block's stroke lighter, if it is already chosen, it turns it back off.

    • isNeighbour

      public boolean isNeighbour​(ColoredNode other)
      Checks if other node is neighbor or not.
      Parameters:
      other - The node to check neighborship.
      Returns:
      true if neighbor, else false.

    • swapAttributes

      public void swapAttributes​(ColoredNode other)
      Swaps the location with given Node.
      Parameters:
      other - Node to swap location.
